definitions: a person or thing that repeats something.
shortDefinitions: person or thing that repeats something

definitions: a firearm which fires several shots without reloading
shortDefinitions: firearm which fires several shots without reloading

definitions: a watch or clock that can be made to repeat its last strike.
shortDefinitions: watch or clock which repeats its last strike when required

definitions: a device for the automatic retransmission or amplification of an electrically transmitted message.
shortDefinitions: device for automatic retransmission or amplification of electrically transmitted message
